    Carrot - Class in classes
    Carrot food item object to be fed to the pet.

    changeState(State) - Method in class classes.Pet
    Changes the pet's state and triggers state behavior.
    checkHappinessRecovery() - Method in class classes.angryState
    Checks whether the pet has recovered from the angry state.
    checkStat(int) - Method in class classes.Commands
    Returns the value of the specified stat from the pet.
    classes - package classes
     
    Commands - Class in classes
    The Commands class handles all player interactions with a pet.
    Commands(Pet) - Constructor for class classes.Commands
    Constructs a new Commands controller for the specified pet.
    CommandType - Class in classes
    The CommandType class defines constants representing different command actions a player can perform on their pet.
    CommandType() - Constructor for class classes.CommandType
